name: Genesis

chargingStrategy.nacsAdoptionTimeline: Native NACS starting with 2026 models (GV60, GV70 Electrified)

networkPartnerships: Shares 800V charging technology with Hyundai and Kia
NACS adapter program for existing CCS1 models

content.description: Genesis is Hyundai's luxury brand, offering premium electric vehicles with cutting-edge technology. The GV60 and Electrified GV70 feature 800V architecture enabling ultra-fast charging (10-80% in 18 minutes), luxurious interiors, and advanced driver assistance systems.
content.evStrategySummary: Genesis positions itself as a luxury EV brand with premium features, advanced technology, and competitive pricing compared to European luxury brands. Shares platform and technology with Hyundai IONIQ 5 and Kia EV6 but with elevated materials, design, and amenities. Focus on innovation, performance, and luxury.
